citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Protocol 24-XX did not include all euthanasia methods used. The protocol description states the hamsters would be
euthanized via inhalation of carbon dioxide gas. During this inspection, the facility representative further clarified that
cervical dislocation is also used as an adjunct method, but was not incorporated in the protocol description.
Providing a complete description of all euthanasia methods utilized ensures a thorough and sound review by the IACUC,
affirming the requested methods are appropriate for use in the study. Any proposed activity involving animals must
contain a description of any euthanasia method to be used.
Correct by September 15, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the authorized person.
n

narrative:
2.31(e)(5) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Protocol 24-XX did not include all euthanasia methods used. The protocol description states the hamsters would be 
euthanized via inhalation of carbon dioxide gas. During this inspection, the facility representative further clarified that 
cervical dislocation is also used as an adjunct method, but was not incorporated in the protocol description.  
Providing a complete description of all euthanasia methods utilized ensures a thorough and sound review by the IACUC, 
affirming the requested methods are appropriate for use in the study. Any proposed activity involving animals must 
contain a description of any euthanasia method to be used. 
 
Correct by September 15, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the authorized person. 
 
 n
